FEEP-MAPPING.SQL: CREATE TABLE feep_user(id character varying(50) NOT NULL,username character varying(50),showname character varying(50),password character varying(50),type character varying(50),identitycard character varying(50),birthday date,tel character varying(50),email character varying(50),address character varying(100),remarks character varying(200),CONSTRAINT feep_user_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id))
SELECT id, username, password, type, identitycard, birthday, tel, email, address, remarks, showname FROM feep_user
SELECT id, username, password, type, identitycard, birthday, tel, email, address, remarks, showname FROM feep_user WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, username, password, type, identitycard, birthday, tel, email, address, remarks, showname FROM feep_user WHERE username = ?
INSERT INTO feep_user(id, username, showname, password, type, identitycard, birthday, tel, email, address, remarks) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE feep_user SET type = '-1' WHERE id = ?
UPDATE feep_user SET type = '-1' WHERE id in
DELETE FROM feep_user WHERE id in
